title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1601.2 - Federal and municipal projects
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1601.2 - Federal and municipal projects

State Regulations

An authority shall file with the commissioner a copy
of: (a) The "application" to each
proposed project embodying a Federal or municipal loaning agency, a copy of the
architectural plans, specifications, estimated costs and proposed method of
financing--at the same time that it is filed with said agency. Any change made
in the application or the project shall be filed with the commissioner by the
authority. (Public Housing Law, ยง38.)
(b) The transcript of the proceedings
authorizing the issuance of bonds or other obligations of the authority or the
municipality, for each project. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
1601.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
